name: phonebook-backend
description: This repository contains exercise solutions to the part 3 of the course.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fso-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
